statements: SELECT * FROM novel_drug_targets
SELECT gene_name, drug_target_label FROM novel_drug_targets
SELECT id, gene_name, drug_target_label FROM novel_drug_targets WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM novel_drug_targets ORDER BY gene_name DESC
SELECT gene_name, expression_profile FROM novel_drug_targets LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM novel_drug_targets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, drug_target_label FROM novel_drug_targets WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM novel_drug_targets WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%' AND expression_profile IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_target_label FROM novel_drug_targets WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY drug_target_label;
SELECT id, gene_name, expression_profile FROM novel_drug_targets WHERE expression_profile LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_targets WHERE target_gene_id = 1;
SELECT target_gene_name, expression_profile FROM drug_targets WHERE drug_id = 5;
SELECT target_gene_id, target_gene_name FROM drug_targets ORDER BY target_gene_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_profiles WHERE gene_id = 3;
SELECT gene_name FROM gene_expression_profiles WHERE profile_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM drug_targets WHERE target_gene_id = 1;
SELECT drug_id, target_gene_name FROM drug_targets WHERE target_gene_id = 2;
SELECT drug_id, target_gene_id, target_gene_name, expression_profile FROM drug_targets WHERE drug_id = 5;
SELECT drug_id, target_gene_id, target_gene_name, expression_profile FROM drug_targets WHERE drug_id < 10 AND target_gene_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_profiles WHERE gene_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_profiles;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM gene_expression_profiles ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT target_name FROM drug_targets WHERE target_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM drug_gene_relationship WHERE gene_id = 5;
SELECT target_name, target_function FROM drug_targets WHERE target_function LIKE '%inhibitor%';
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_profiles;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_profiles ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT target_name, target_function FROM drug_targets WHERE target_function LIKE '%inhibitor%';
SELECT drug_id, gene_id FROM drug_gene_relationship WHERE drug_id = 1 AND gene_id = 5;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_profiles WHERE expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT gene_name, chromosomal_location FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT target_name, action FROM DrugTargets WHERE action = 'Inhibitor';
SELECT patient_id, expression_level FROM GeneExpression WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, gender, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, chromosomal_location FROM Genes WHERE chromosome IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY gene_name ASC;

SELECT Patients.patient_id, Patients.age, GeneExpression.expression_level FROM Patients JOIN GeneExpression ON Patients.patient_id = GeneExpression.patient_id WHERE GeneExpression.expression_level > 0.5;

SELECT Genes.gene_name, DrugTargets.target_name, DrugTargets.action FROM Genes JOIN DrugTargets ON Genes.gene_id = DrugTargets.gene_id WHERE DrugTargets.action = 'inhibitor' ORDER BY Genes.gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpression;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpression WHERE expression_level > 5;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT molecule_name, target_name FROM DrugMolecules JOIN DrugTargets ON DrugMolecules.target_id = DrugTargets.target_id;
SELECT result_id, result_type, result_description FROM ResearchResults WHERE result_type = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM GeneExpression ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpression WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT t.target_name, m.molecule_name FROM DrugTargets t JOIN DrugMolecules m ON t.target_id = m.target_id;
SELECT r.result_id, r.result_type, c.trial_name FROM ResearchResults r JOIN ClinicalTrials c ON r.trial_id = c.trial_id WHERE r.result_type = 'positive';
SELECT c.trial_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, g.gene_name FROM ClinicalTrials c JOIN DrugTargets t ON c.target_id = t.target_id JOIN GeneExpression g ON t.gene_id = g.gene_id;
